description.value: Your body has adapted a defensive mechanism to break off your quills in an attacker, allowing you to defend yourself against aggressive predators, though it takes a while for the quills to grow back. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Barbed Quills]{Barbed Quills} reaction.

source.value: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Mwangi Expanse
